name: Dinosaurus
description:
For children 2-12 !
Dinosaurus is a simple and fun set of dinosaurs for small children to play with.
It includes:
-Tyranosaurus Rex
-Brontosaurus
-Stegosaurus
-Triceratops
-Carnotorus
-Spinosaurus
-Parasaurolophous
-Ankylosaurus
-Velociraptor

Walk the dinosaurs around a lush tropical paradise and watch out for other dinosaurs!
Control the tyrannosaur and attack other dinosaurs!
Squash dinosaurs with the giant Brontosaurus!

Loads of fun for small kids !
